title: A terrific Paris location with all the amenities of home!
text:
We had read that the Citadines Trocadero needed a facelift. Fine with us! We'd rather pay a bit less and have perfectly working appliances, internet, comfy beds, fabulous bath tub and full kitchen for cooking than pay more and have new paint. We were anxious about our upcoming stay in the Citadines Trocadero because people complained about the peeling paint and "tired" carpet. We're just sorry that after they renovate we probably would not be able to afford what they'll end up charging to help pay for the renovations... We loved our stay at the Citadines Trocadero. The only noise was the garbage pickup outside our window at 7 am. We never heard any of the other residents in their rooms. Go while it's affordable!
Room Tip: If you don't want to be awakened by the trash pickup in the street at 7 am, ask for a room high... See more room tips
